mapper.select: SELECT products.product_name, SUM(payments_detail.selling_price) AS selling_price FROM payments_detail INNER JOIN products ON payments_detail.product_id = products.product_id GROUP BY products.product_name ORDER BY selling_price DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT products.product_name, SUM(payments_detail.selling_price) AS selling_price FROM payments_detail INNER JOIN products ON payments_detail.product_id = products.product_id INNER JOIN payments ON payments_detail.payment_id = payments.payment_id WHERE payments.payment_date BETWEEN #{trfirstSelectedDate} AND #{trlastSelectedDate} GROUP BY products.product_name ORDER BY selling_price desc limit 5
SELECT SUM(price) AS total_price FROM stock_history WHERE reg_date BETWEEN CURDATE() - INTERVAL 5 DAY AND CURDATE() GROUP BY DATE(reg_date)

SELECT SUM(od.purchase_price * od.quantity * p.unit_quantity) AS total_price_order FROM order_detail od LEFT JOIN products p ON od.product_id = p.product_id WHERE od.receipt_date BETWEEN CURDATE() - INTERVAL 5 DAY AND CURDATE() GROUP BY DATE(od.receipt_date)
SELECT SUM(COALESCE(p.used_points, 0)) AS total_used_points FROM payments p WHERE p.payment_date BETWEEN CURDATE() - INTERVAL 5 DAY AND CURDATE() GROUP BY DATE(p.payment_date)
SELECT SUM(COALESCE(p.used_points, 0)) AS total_all_price FROM payments p WHERE p.payment_date BETWEEN '2024-01-02' AND '2024-01-07' GROUP BY DATE(p.payment_date)

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN category.parent_category = 'A' THEN payments_detail.selling_price ELSE 0 END) AS food, SUM(CASE WHEN category.parent_category = 'B' THEN payments_detail.selling_price ELSE 0 END) AS necessity, SUM(CASE WHEN category.parent_category = 'C' THEN payments_detail.selling_price ELSE 0 END) AS electronics FROM payments_detail INNER JOIN products ON payments_detail.product_id = products.product_id INNER JOIN category ON products.category_id = category.category_id INNER JOIN payments ON payments_detail.payment_id = payments.payment_id WHERE payments.payment_date = '2024-01-08'

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN category.parent_category = 'A' THEN payments_detail.selling_price ELSE 0 END) AS food, SUM(CASE WHEN category.parent_category = 'B' THEN payments_detail.selling_price ELSE 0 END) AS necessity, SUM(CASE WHEN category.parent_category = 'C' THEN payments_detail.selling_price ELSE 0 END) AS electronics FROM payments_detail INNER JOIN products ON payments_detail.product_id = products.product_id INNER JOIN category ON products.category_id = category.category_id INNER JOIN payments ON payments_detail.payment_id = payments.payment_id WHERE payments.payment_date BETWEEN #{trfirstSelectedDate} AND #{trlastSelectedDate}
